data.text: @HPA_MV I hope government applies more restrictions due to covid 19. The number of infections is still high compared to Maldive  population. I wish to visit Maldive soon but it depends on decreasing the average of new daily cases 🥲🥲🥲

@HPA_MV Urgent News!
 
Impending global food crisis! 
An astonishing solution!
An introduction to the happiest place on earth! A place that is COVID-free and mask-free!"
